title: College Recruiter Jobs Scraper
description: Extract entry-level jobs and internships from College Recruiter. Search by keywords, location, and employment type.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Direct College Recruiter search URL to scrape. If set, overrides other search parameters.

keyword.title: Search Keywords
keyword.description: Job title or skills to search (e.g., 'software engineer', 'marketing intern', 'data analyst').

results_wanted.title: Maximum Jobs to Extract
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect (1-1000).

max_pages.title: Maximum Sitemaps
max_pages.description: Maximum number of latest job sitemaps to scan.

maxConcurrency.title: Max Concurrency
maxConcurrency.description: Maximum concurrent requests for better performance.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy to avoid blocking and ensure reliable data collection.
